title: Just in Type
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Just in Type**

[Brazilian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Brazil) typefoundry, ran by typo-brothers [Caio de Marco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Caio%20de%20Marco) and [Tony de Marco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tony%20de%20Marco). Located in [São Paulo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sao%20Paulo).

website  
 [http://www.justintype.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230825/http:/www.justintype.com.br/ "http://www.justintype.com.br")
author: Miguel Sousa
